Text:
Classic Star Trek, the pilot that started of decades of fantastic Science Fiction. A genre was born when paramount picked up this show. This pilot was produced by the production company Desilu, owned and operated by Lucille Ball and Desi Armond.

Lucille Ball most known for her own show "I love Lucy".

History in the making.
This is a real classic. They actually did show this on swedish tv maybe 10 years ago. It was really amazing to see it because I loved Star Trek and still do. TOS is the best.
One of my favorites.  Brings back memories!  Thnks!
How the fuck could this be a dead torrent?  I must be dreaming.
